verses.verse: <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H6680>"Command<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and <S%H559>tell<s%> <S%H935>them,<s%> 'When you come into the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan<s%> (this is the <S%H776>land<s%> that shall <S%H5307>fall<s%> to you for an <S%H5159>inheritance,<s%> even the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan<s%> according to its <S%H1367>borders<s%>),

then your <S%H5045>south<s%> <S%H6285>quarter<s%> shall be from the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> of <S%H6790>Zin<s%> along by the <S%H3027>side<s%> of <S%H123>Edom,<s%> and your <S%H5045>south<s%> <S%H1366>border<s%> shall be from the <S%H7097>end<s%> of the <S%H4417>Salt<s%> <S%H3220>Sea<s%> <S%H6924>eastward;<s%>

and your <S%H1366>border<s%> shall <S%H5437>turn<s%> about <S%H5045>southward<s%> of the <S%H4608>ascent<s%> of <S%H4610>Akrabbim,<s%> and pass <S%H5674>along<s%> to <S%H6790>Zin;<s%> and the goings <S%H8444>out<s%> of it shall be <S%H5045>southward<s%> of Kadesh <S%H6947>Barnea;<s%> and it shall go <S%H3318>forth<s%> to Hazar <S%H2692>Addar,<s%> and pass <S%H5674>along<s%> to <S%H6111>Azmon;<s%>

and the <S%H1366>border<s%> shall turn <S%H5437>about<s%> from <S%H6111>Azmon<s%> to the <S%H5158>brook<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> and the goings <S%H8444>out<s%> of it shall be at the <S%H3220>sea.<s%>
<S%H3220><s%>"'For the western <S%H1366>border,<s%> you shall have the <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H3220>sea<s%> and its <S%H1366>border:<s%> this shall be your <S%H3220>west<s%> <S%H1366>border.<s%>
<S%H6828><s%>"'This shall be your north <S%H1366>border:<s%> from the <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H3220>sea<s%> you shall mark <S%H8376>out<s%> for you <S%H2022>Mount<s%> <S%H2023>Hor;<s%>

from <S%H2022>Mount<s%> <S%H2023>Hor<s%> you shall mark <S%H8376>out<s%> to the <S%H935>entrance<s%> of <S%H2574>Hamath;<s%> and the goings <S%H8444>out<s%> of the <S%H1366>border<s%> shall be at <S%H6657>Zedad;<s%>

and the <S%H1366>border<s%> shall go <S%H3318>forth<s%> to <S%H2202>Ziphron,<s%> and the goings <S%H8444>out<s%> of it shall be at Hazar <S%H2704>Enan:<s%> this shall be your <S%H6828>north<s%> <S%H1366>border.<s%>
<S%H184><s%>"'You shall mark out your <S%H6924>east<s%> <S%H1366>border<s%> from Hazar <S%H2704>Enan<s%> to <S%H8221>Shepham;<s%>

and the <S%H1366>border<s%> shall go <S%H3381>down<s%> from <S%H8221>Shepham<s%> to <S%H7247>Riblah,<s%> on the east <S%H6924>side<s%> of <S%H5871>Ain;<s%> and the <S%H1366>border<s%> shall go <S%H3381>down,<s%> and shall <S%H4229>reach<s%> to the <S%H3802>side<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea<s%> of <S%H3672>Chinnereth<s%> <S%H6924>eastward;<s%>

and the <S%H1366>border<s%> shall go <S%H3381>down<s%> to the <S%H3383>Jordan,<s%> and the goings <S%H8444>out<s%> of it shall be at the <S%H4417>Salt<s%> <S%H3220>Sea.<s%> This shall be your <S%H776>land<s%> according to its <S%H1367>borders<s%> around <S%H5439>it.<s%>'"

<S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> "This is the <S%H776>land<s%> which you shall <S%H5157>inherit<s%> by <S%H1486>lot,<s%> which <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> has <S%H6680>commanded<s%> to <S%H5414>give<s%> to the <S%H8672>nine<s%> <S%H4294>tribes,<s%> and to the <S%H2677>half<s%> - <S%H4294>tribe;<s%>

for the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H7206>Reuben<s%> according to their <S%H1>fathers<s%>' <S%H1004>houses,<s%> and the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1425>Gad<s%> according to their <S%H1>fathers<s%>' <S%H1004>houses,<s%> have <S%H3947>received,<s%> and the <S%H2677>half<s%> - <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%> have <S%H3947>received,<s%> their <S%H5159>inheritance:<s%>

the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H4294>tribes<s%> and the <S%H2677>half<s%> - <S%H4294>tribe<s%> have <S%H3947>received<s%> their <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> <S%H5676>beyond<s%> the <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> at <S%H3405>Jericho<s%> <S%H6924>eastward,<s%> toward the <S%H4217>sunrise.<s%>"
<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

"These are the <S%H8034>names<s%> of the <S%H582>men<s%> who shall <S%H5157>divide<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> to you for <S%H499>inheritance:<s%> Eleazar the <S%H3548>priest,<s%> and <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5126>Nun.<s%>
You shall <S%H3947>take<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H5387>prince<s%> of every <S%H4294>tribe,<s%> to <S%H5157>divide<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> for <S%H5157>inheritance.<s%>
These are the <S%H8034>names<s%> of the <S%H582>men:<s%> Of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> <S%H3612>Caleb<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3312>Jephunneh.<s%>
Of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H8095>Simeon,<s%> <S%H8050>Shemuel<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5989>Ammihud.<s%>
Of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H1144>Benjamin,<s%> <S%H449>Elidad<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3692>Chislon.<s%>
Of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1835>Dan<s%> a <S%H5387>prince,<s%> <S%H1231>Bukki<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3020>Jogli.<s%>

Of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3130>Joseph:<s%> of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%> a <S%H5387>prince,<s%> <S%H2592>Hanniel<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H641>Ephod.<s%>
Of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> a <S%H5387>prince,<s%> <S%H7055>Kemuel<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H8204>Shiphtan.<s%>
Of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H2074>Zebulun<s%> a <S%H5387>prince,<s%> <S%H469>Elizaphan<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6535>Parnach.<s%>
Of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3485>Issachar<s%> a <S%H5387>prince,<s%> <S%H6409>Paltiel<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5821>Azzan.<s%>
Of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H836>Asher<s%> a <S%H5387>prince,<s%> <S%H282>Ahihud<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H8015>Shelomi.<s%>
Of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H5321>Naphtali<s%> a <S%H5387>prince,<s%> <S%H6300>Pedahel<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5989>Ammihud.<s%>"

These are they whom <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> to divide the <S%H5157>inheritance<s%> to the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan.<s%>
